imdb.plot outline: Con mi novio no te metas (Don't Mess With My Boyfriend) is a Peruvian web series that tells the story of Alejandro (David Carrillo) and Pepe (Jose Dammert), a gay couple living in present day Peru. Even though Alejandro is considerably older than Pepe, they have a healthy relationship, and spend a lot of time both working in their respective jobs, and having fun with their best friends, Carolina (Mayra Najar) and Sebastian (Gonzalo Whitehead). The problem? Pepe doesn't dare to come out of the closet, meaning his mom's never met Alejandro. The latter is getting tired of this, and several funny and dramatic situations come up from the fact that Alejandro wants Pepe to tell her mom about their relationship for once and for all, so they can move in together and be happy.
imdb.title: Con mi novio no te metas
akas: Con mi novio no te metas (Peru)
plot: _Con mi novio no te metas_ (qv) (Don't Mess With My Boyfriend) is a Peruvian web series that tells the story of Alejandro (David Carrillo) and Pepe (Jose Dammert), a gay couple living in present day Peru. Even though Alejandro is considerably older than Pepe, they have a healthy relationship, and spend a lot of time both working in their respective jobs, and having fun with their best friends, Carolina (Mayra Najar) and Sebastian (Gonzalo Whitehead). The problem? Pepe doesn't dare to come out of the closet, meaning his mom's never met Alejandro. The latter is getting tired of this, and several funny and dramatic situations come up from the fact that Alejandro wants Pepe to tell her mom about their relationship for once and for all, so they can move in together and be happy.::Sebastian Zavala
